扻字的基本解释

扻
zhì
古同“栉”。

扻

扻

扻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《集韻》側瑟切，入櫛，心。］
同“櫛1”。
梳理。
[②]［sǔn］
［《集韻》鎖本切，上混，心。］
“損1”的古字。

扻字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页419第14
【集韻】側吏切，音胾。治髮也。【莊子·庚桑楚】?髮而扻，數米而炊。　又子結切，音節。義同。　又側瑟切。與櫛同。　又【集韻】損，古作扻。註詳十畫。　又苦感切，音坎。擊也。

扻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
扻字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Jiyun" cuts sideways, enters the bar, and the heart. ]
Same as "栉1".
Combing.
[②] [sǔn]
["Ji Yun" locks the original cut, mixed up, heart. ]
The ancient word for "loss 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　扻; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 419 14
[Ji Yun] side staff cut, sound sub. It also cures the hair. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu]? The hair is smashed, and the rice is cooked for a few meters.　Sub-knot cut again, syllable. The same meaning.　Cut sideways again. Same as 栉.　[Jiyun] Lost again, ancient works. Note ten paintings in detail.　It's bitter and painful, and the sound is high. Hit also.
